hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### A utility. This one you'll need to edit the PHP file and enter wich taxon file you want to process. #php gen_higherClass.php
### *Has parentID but no value. Has ancestry values. ### This will add higherClassification in taxon.tab and rebuild the DwCA. With carry-over of other extensions. ### source is: TreatmentBank_final.tar.gz php dwca_utility.php _ '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_final", "task": "gen_hC_using_ancestry"}' ### generates FILENAME-with-hC.tar.gz
### This use gnparser one name at a time. Not entire file. php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_final-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_1
### Start matching taxa php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_final-with-hC"}' #OK gen neo4j_2
### Convert taxon.tab, use EOLid value for taxonID. ### REMINDER: Multiple scinames with different taxonIDs have the same canonical thus will have the same EOLid php use_EOLid_as_taxonID.php _ '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_final-with-hC"}' # gen neo4j_3
### rename cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp TreatmentBank_final-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz TreatmentBank_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz ls -lt TreatmentBank_final-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz ls -lt TreatmentBank_TraitBank_1_0.tar.gz rm -f TreatmentBank_final-with-hC_neo4j_3.tar.gz
### Generate CSV files for Neo4j: OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors php generate_csv_4neo4j.php _ '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_TraitBank_1_0"}' #latest
